comment: I used the mute button on Gab for years, and I promoted Gab on Twitter and Facebook constantly as the only viable alternative to their left-wing censorship. But I prefer a platform that is now available, that does not promote Communism, Nazism or Islamism.
amr:
# ::snt I used the mute button on Gab for years, and I promoted Gab on Twitter and Facebook constantly as the only viable alternative to their left-wing censorship. But I prefer a platform that is now available, that does not promote Communism, Nazism or Islamism.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (b / button
                        :ARG0-of (m2 / mute-01))
                  :duration (m3 / multiple
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (y / year))))
            :op2 (p / promote-02
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (p2 / publication
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Gab"))
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p3 / publication
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Twitter"))
                        :op2 (p4 / publication
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Facebook")))
                  :manner (c / constant)
                  :prep-as (a3 / alternative
                        :mod (v / viable)
                        :mod (o / only)
                        :ARG1-of (ii2 / instead-of-91
                              :ARG2 (c2 / censor-01
                                    :ARG0 (t2 / they)
                                    :ARG1-of (l / left-19))))))
      :snt2 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (p5 / prefer-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (p6 / platform
                        :ARG2-of (a4 / available-02
                              :time (n4 / now))
                        :ARG0-of (p7 / promote-02
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (o2 / or
                                    :op1 (p8 / political-movement
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "communism"))
                                    :op2 (p9 / political-movement
                                          :name (n6 / name
                                                :op1 "Nazism"))
                                    :op3 (r / religious-group
                                          :name (n7 / name
                                                :op1 "Islamism"))))))))

comment: racist and derogatory views are hurtful and uncalled for. Please refrain from this type of behavior or you will be reported
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hurtful)
            :op2 (c / call-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (v / view-02
                        :mod (r / racist)
                        :mod (d / derogatory)))
            :domain (a2 / and
                  :op1 h)
            :op2 c
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 v)
      :snt2 (o / or
            :op1 (r2 / refrain-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (b / behave-01
                        :mod (t / type
                              :mod (t2 / this))))
            :op2 (r3 / report-01
                  :ARG1 y)))

comment: I can't even understand your argument through all the hate speech. Please rephrase so I can consider your point of view.
amr:
# ::snt I can't even understand your argument through all the hate speech. Please rephrase so I can consider your point of view.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (u / understand-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (a / argue-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you))
                  :manner (s / speak-01
                        :ARG1 (h / hate-01)
                        :mod (a2 / all))
                  :mod (e / even)))
      :snt2 (r / rephrase-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :purpose (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (c / consider-02
                        :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                        :ARG1 (h2 / have-point-of-view-08
                              :ARG0 y2)))))
